content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Greetings, Haoyu Wang. While I appreciate your interest in our apartment in Munich, let me emphasize that during our discussion today we will solely focus on the rental price. Regarding your inquiry, I hope to achieve the highest potential price for this prime location. Now, if you have an initial price proposal, please feel free to share it. In response, I will accept or decline based on my goal. 'TERMINATE' once we reach an agreement or fail to find common ground.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
